**First attempt at reproducing PDF Sense paper figure 8**

[google scholar paper link](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=9110690189452049647&hl=en&as_sdt=0,5)

![](/else/PDFsense_quasiFig8.gif)

### Pseudo code
```{r, eval=F, include=T}
dfPDF <-  read_tsv("./tsv/HERA2NoJet_abs/residual_all_norm_1_RawData.tsv", col_names=FALSE)
dfMeta <- read_tsv("./tsv/HERA2NoJet_abs/metadata_RawData.tsv")
load("fGT_6d.rda") # tour path for projections p=6 pca dim.

...

animate(select(grDIScenter,-type, -disID),
        planned_tour(fGT_6d),
        aps = 4,
        display_groupxy(col = grDIScenter$disID, group_by=grDIScenter$disID, gp_legend = FALSE))

...

render(dat, grand_tour(),
       display_groupxy(col = cat, group_by=cat, gp_legend = FALSE),
       "png", "./output/PDFsense_fig8_%02d.png", frames = 99)
```
